data.message: Why not use that money for more useful things ? Like feeding our own people and schooling them so we can compete with other countries on an educational level. We open schools over there and close them here , disgusting.

replies.message: I'm thirteen and even I'm smart enough to see our country is screwed because we do stupid things like this to waste money. Fix that $17 billion+ debt we owe to China first. Then worry about others.

Lol yeah Facebook is a national political party.... What about people who can basically learn anything in the third world without a great cost. Because of the Internet they can learn why their crops are having diseases and do something about it. The Internet is not only Facebook, you have the opportunity to learn everything so start doing, instead of using only Facebook to gather information.
